summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $82.45 out of Local Improvement District Fund No. 2218, Ordinance No. 22509, in favor of Burwell & Morford, as a refund of installments two to five, inclusive, including interest, as assessed against lots 14 and 15, block 19, University Park Addition, due and payable August 12, 1912, 1913, 1914, and 1915, which were paid in advance in error on December 15, 1911, as evidenced by City Treasurer's Receipt No. AL 9835, and directing the City Treasurer to reinstate said installments on his rolls accordingly.
